members.name: EntityChangeTracker

members.docComment:
/**
 * Commit all changes as when the collection has been completely reloaded from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: commitAll

docs.summary: Commit all changes as when the collection has been completely reloaded from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Commit changes for the given entities as when they have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.
 *
 * @param entityOrIdList - The entities to clear tracking or their ids.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: commitMany

docs.summary: Commit changes for the given entities as when they have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.

params.name: entityOrIdList
params.description: The entities to clear tracking or their ids.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Commit changes for the given entity as when it have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when no entity changes to commit.
 *
 * @param entityOrId - The entity to clear tracking or its id.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: commitOne

docs.summary: Commit changes for the given entity as when it have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when no entity changes to commit.

params.name: entityOrId
params.description: The entity to clear tracking or its id.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Merge query results into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy.
 *
 * @param entities - Entities returned from querying the server.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - How to merge a queried entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 *
 * @returns The merged EntityCollection.
 */
members.name: mergeQueryResults

docs.summary: Merge query results into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy.

params.name: entities
params.description: Entities returned from querying the server.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: How to merge a queried entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Merge result of saving new entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
 *
 * @param entities - Entities returned from saving new entities to the server.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 *
 * @returns The merged EntityCollection.
 */
members.name: mergeSaveAdds

docs.summary: Merge result of saving new entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.

params.name: entities
params.description: Entities returned from saving new entities to the server.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Merge successful result of deleting entities on the server that have the given primary keys Clears the entity changeState for those keys unless the MergeStrategy is ignoreChanges.
 *
 * @param entities - keys primary keys of the entities to remove/delete.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - How to adjust change tracking when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 *
 * @returns The merged EntityCollection.
 */
members.name: mergeSaveDeletes

docs.summary: Merge successful result of deleting entities on the server that have the given primary keys Clears the entity changeState for those keys unless the MergeStrategy is ignoreChanges.

params.name: entities
params.description: keys primary keys of the entities to remove/delete.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: How to adjust change tracking when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Merge result of saving updated entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
 *
 * @param updates - Entity response data returned from saving updated entities to the server.
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 *
 * @param skipUnchanged - True means skip update if server didn't change it. False by default. If the update was optimistic and the server didn't make more changes of its own then the updates are already in the collection and shouldn't make them again.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @returns The merged EntityCollection.
 */
members.name: mergeSaveUpdates

docs.summary: Merge result of saving updated entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.

params.name: updates
params.description: Entity response data returned from saving updated entities to the server.

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

params.name: skipUnchanged
params.description: True means skip update if server didn't change it. False by default. If the update was optimistic and the server didn't make more changes of its own then the updates are already in the collection and shouldn't make them again.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Merge result of saving upserted entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
 *
 * @param entities - Entities returned from saving upsert entities to the server.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 *
 * @returns The merged EntityCollection.
 */
members.name: mergeSaveUpserts

docs.summary: Merge result of saving upserted entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.

params.name: entities
params.description: Entities returned from saving upsert entities to the server.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track multiple entities before adding them to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param entities - The entities to add. They must all have their ids.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 */
members.name: trackAddMany

docs.summary: Track multiple entities before adding them to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: entities
params.description: The entities to add. They must all have their ids.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track an entity before adding it to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param entity - The entity to add. It must have an id.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.
 */
members.name: trackAddOne

docs.summary: Track an entity before adding it to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: entity
params.description: The entity to add. It must have an id.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track multiple entities before removing them with the intention of deleting them on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param keys - The primary keys of the entities to delete.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackDeleteMany

docs.summary: Track multiple entities before removing them with the intention of deleting them on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: keys
params.description: The primary keys of the entities to delete.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track an entity before it is removed with the intention of deleting it on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to delete.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackDeleteOne

docs.summary: Track an entity before it is removed with the intention of deleting it on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key of the entity to delete.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track multiple entities before updating them in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param updates - The entities to update.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackUpdateMany

docs.summary: Track multiple entities before updating them in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: updates
params.description: The entities to update.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track an entity before updating it in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param update - The entity to update.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackUpdateOne

docs.summary: Track an entity before updating it in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: update
params.description: The entity to update.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track multiple entities before upserting (adding and updating) them to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param entities - The entities to add or update. They must be complete entities with ids.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackUpsertMany

docs.summary: Track multiple entities before upserting (adding and updating) them to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: entities
params.description: The entities to add or update. They must be complete entities with ids.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Track an entity before upsert (adding and updating) it to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
 *
 * @param entities - The entity to add or update. It must be a complete entity with its id.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 *
 * @param mergeStrategy - Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.
 */
members.name: trackUpsertOne

docs.summary: Track an entity before upsert (adding and updating) it to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).

params.name: entities
params.description: The entity to add or update. It must be a complete entity with its id.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

params.name: mergeStrategy
params.description: Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Revert the unsaved changes for all collection. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: undoAll

docs.summary: Revert the unsaved changes for all collection. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Revert the unsaved changes for the given entities. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
 *
 * @param entityOrIdList - The entities to revert or their ids.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: undoMany

docs.summary: Revert the unsaved changes for the given entities. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.

params.name: entityOrIdList
params.description: The entities to revert or their ids.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Revert the unsaved changes for the given entity. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
 *
 * @param entityOrId - The entity to revert or its id.
 *
 * @param collection - The entity collection
 */
members.name: undoOne

docs.summary: Revert the unsaved changes for the given entity. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.

params.name: entityOrId
params.description: The entity to revert or its id.

params.name: collection
params.description: The entity collection

docs.summary: Methods for tracking, committing, and reverting/undoing unsaved entity changes. Used by EntityCollectionReducerMethods which should call tracker methods BEFORE modifying the collection. See EntityChangeTracker docs.
